document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
84 specimens ( ZIN , SIZK , ZMUK , NSPU , ZMUM , IMC , SKC , YKC ) from 14 provinces were studied.
Crimea
:
1 spec. ( ZMUN ) Sudak Distr. , Gromivka , valley of Shilen stream, I.S. Nikolayenko leg.,
12.vi.1989
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Sevastopol , V . Kizeritskyi leg.,
19.iv.1920
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Simferopol , Salgir River valley , Semenov-Tian-Shansky leg.,
14.vi.1899
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Kerch , Jacentkowskii leg.,
2.vi.1902
;
2 spec. ( SIZK ) Bilohirsk Distr. , Bila Skelya, S. V . Volovnik ,
17.v.1983
;
Cherkasy Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Zvenygorodka Distr. , Katerynopil , E. Zverezomb-Zubovski leg.,
11.v.1911
;
8 spec. ( ZMUK ) Kanyv Distr. , Hamarnya , A.F. Krishtal leg.,
7.vi.1948
;
Donetsk Prov.
: 1 spec. ( ZIN ) Svyatohirsk Distr. , Prishib , Donets River , Arnoldi leg.,
vii.1936
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Svyatohirsk Distr. , Banne , Arnoldi leg.,
10.vi.1937
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Svyatohirsk Distr. , Tetyanivka , Donets River , Arnoldi leg.,
vii.1936
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Volnovakha Distr. , Velykoanadolskyi Forest , Sylantyev leg.
;
1 spec. ( SKC ) Torez ,
26.v.2006
; Kropyvnytskyi Prov. :
1 spec. ( ZMUN ) Znamyanka Distr. , Chutivka , P.N. Sheshurak leg.,
31.v.2003
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Alexandria Distr. , Chervono-Nerubayivske Forestry , D. Pomerantzev leg.,
6.vi.1899
;
1 spec. ( IMC ) Olexandrivka ,
5.vi.1955
;
1 spec. ( ZIN ) Kropyvnytskyi [=Yelizavetgrad], Jacentkowskij leg.;
Luhansk Prov.
:
1 spec. ( SKC ) Slovyanoserbsk Distr. , Tryohizbenka ,
8.viii.2011
; Zakarpatska Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Perechin env.,
7.viii.1957
;
Zaporizhia Prov.
: 1 spec. ( SIZK ) Berdyansk , 1892
;
1 spec. ( YKC ) Melitopol Distr. , Myrne , Yu. V . Karmyshev leg.,
24.vi.2012
;
Zhytomyr Prov. :
1 spec. ( SIZK ) Zhytomyr , G. Proschiga leg.,
16.ix.1920
.

Biology. Grasslands, forests, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in III–X. Oligophagous on
Boraginaceae ( Huber, Vayssieres 1990 )
.

Notes. Taxonomy of the European and western Asian species of
Pachycerus
is not clearly understood ( Meregalli & Fremuth 2013 ). According to Ter-Minasian (1988) and Meregalli & Fremuth (2013) all findings in European part of former USSR refer to
P. cordiger
(=
P. segnis
). So we consider all Ukrainian records as
P. segnis (Germ.)
. Naturally, this is provisional concept serves here until revision of Palaearctic
Pachycerus
has been done. Łomnicky (1877: 152) identified this specie as
Cleonus segnis Germ. (Faldermanni F.)
” and
Cleonus faldermanni
auct. nec Fåhraeus, 1842.
